replies.body:
When are the new little leguends coming out? I thought they'd be out but they aren't in my shop??
Also, say if you bought 55 eggs to get the whole set ((10 + 1)*5), what happens to the extra egg?

Any updates on the bug that doesn't allow some players to change the view of their map to see any maps. Aka If it comes down to the final two I can't see what the enemy team set up is putting myself at a huge disadvantage?

Are you guys planning on addressing LEAONA'S stun at any point? its been completely too long for like idk the ENTIRE EXISTANCE OF THIS GAME MODE, it builds up faster than mordes ult, it does cc and more dmg.
